aas:langStringDefinitionTypeIec61360.aas:text: Information die den Verwertungsnachweis definiert.
Information on the certificate of destruction. In german: Verwertungsnachweis

aas:langStringTextType.aas:text: Information on the certificate of destruction. In german: Verwertungsnachweis
Date of issue of the certificate of destruction
Serial number to identify the certificate of destruction
Boolean flag to indicate whether the information in the data set is complete. If the data set contains unknown fields, the value is false
The house number of the address
The location or city of the address
Name of the private individual, company or authority
Boolean flag to indicate whether the information in the data set is complete. If the data set contains unknown fields, the value is false
Empty weight in accordance with §2Abs.1 Nr.23 AltfahrzeugV
The first time this vehicle got registered with an initial license plate
Current (i.e. last) assigned number/ license plate to the vehicle
The first characters on the license plate
The unique vehicle identification number (VIN) of the vehicle
Vehicle class the vehicle refers to
Receiving entity with properties to describe the respective company and auditor
True if the vehicle has been withdrawn from the service and out of circulation
The house number of the address
The location or city of the address
Name of the private individual, company or authority
The date of issue of the certificate
The date of expiration of the certificate
The house number of the address
The location or city of the address
Name of the private individual, company or authority
Dismantler entity with properties to describe the respective company, auditor and legal authority
True if the vehicle has been withdrawn from the service and out of circulation
The house number of the address
The location or city of the address
Name of the private individual, company or authority
The house number of the address
The location or city of the address
Name of the private individual, company or authority
The house number of the address
The location or city of the address
Name of the private individual, company or authority
The date of issue of the certificate
The date of expiration of the certificate
The house number of the address
The location or city of the address
Name of the private individual, company or authority
Information on the certificate of destruction. In german: Verwertungsnachweis
